channel.title: Project Undeadscape - starting!
channel.description:
[b]Undeadscape v1 development team[/b] I have decided to start my project. Me some friends all think it'll be best to start this project..even though i had to kick one of them out due to mouthing off and being a waste of space..Project undeadscape is a starting development and hope to be one of the best once finished!
note:The pick of source to be edited will be decided by .. co owner + server coders + client coders!
What we are aiming for: Testers:-
------------ -- client tester ------------ -- server tester ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Client Coders:-[3 spots left] Geoffrey11 --head client coder -------------- --assisitant head -------------- --
note:A 377 cache and maybe 471 gameframe would be gd for the this project ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Server coders:- [4 spots left1] xx sophie xx -- head coder ----------- -- assistant head ----------- -- ---------- -- To be server coder you must be able to prove yourself to do somthing (i will say somthing to code randomly and u have to code it...if u code it fine welcome to the team :P) ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Server staff:- {Admins} xx sophie xx -- owner ------------- -- co-owner Kate -- head staff ------------- -- ------------- -- {mods} ------- -- ------- -- ------ -- ------ --
___________________________________________________________________________________________ website coders: ---------- -- --------- -- ___________________________________________________________________________________________ Forum coders: --------- -- --------- -- --------- -- ___________________________________________________________________________________________ Server hoster: ------------ -- (i will tell them to run server so i can check if they can really run a server) __________________________________________________________________________________________ please make sure you have msn/aim to talk. _________________________________________________________________________________________ Application to join(COPY PASTE AND FILL OUT THEN POST IT:p): [quote]Name will use on srver: ___ Position wish to have: ___ (ONLY PUT UR MSN/AIM/YAHOO IF U HAVE IT DONT MAKE A NEW 1..MUST HAVE ATLEAST1) msn: aim: ___ How long you wish to play server for: ___ Will you do your job properly even when owner says to do it: ___ profe(needed):

item.title: Project Undeadscape - starting!
item.dc:creator: @motoxnick motoxnick
item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

Name will use on server:Motoxnick

Position wish to have:Co-Owner

(ONLY PUT UR MSN/AIM/YAHOO IF U HAVE IT DONT MAKE A NEW 1…MUST HAVE ATLEAST1)
msn:motoxnick@hughes.net
aim:MotoXNick607

How long you wish to play server for:6 hours a day

Will you do your job properly even when owner says to do it:Yes

proof(needed):I worked for the legendary P00ningscape I was Co-Owner of it…

Read full topic
